root.name: Flight Unlimited II
root.description: OverviewFlight Unlimited II flew a different path for the second installment. Instead of aerobatics, it was to be a more direct competitor to Microsoft's Flight Simulator. This time, focusing on 3D mesh environements, photorealistic ground terrain, and real-time communications with flight control.GameplayFeatures:- Location-based damage system into four areas: tail, nose, wings (left and right)- Simulates engine and equipment failure- Customize your flight: weather, time of day, wind, fog, etc.Location:- Set in San Francisco (roughly 13,000 square nautical miles)Available Flyable Aircraft:- Piper Arrow- Beechcraft Baron- De Haviland DHC-2 Beaver seaplane- Fokker Dr.I triplane (introduced by a patch after release)- P-51D Mustang- Trainer 172
